# count

**Instance Property**

The number of animations in the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
var count: Int { get }
```

## Inspecting an animation collection

- **isEmpty**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the collection is empty.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the collection is empty.
